tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I went to Dr Anitha’s clinic for my daughter’s treatment after reading reviews online and I am glad we made the right decision. We had previously seen a dentist in KSA where half of her treatment for dental alignment was done. Ever since we moved to India we constantly received confusing remarks about the treatment she underwent , and most of the dentists we went to, said that the treatment was all wrong and will cost us a lot to get everything rectified.
Dr Anitha was the first and the only dentist who listened to our concerns patiently, who reassured us that nothing was majorly wrong with my daughter’s teeth and everything could be handled without worry. She is a highly skilled doctor, has very professional mannerisms and extremely kind towards patients and their families. A lot of dentists we consulted previously were only fees oriented  and didn’t really pay attention to our needs, Dr Anitha on the other hand has reasonable charges and will only do what is needed. My daughter kept asking her questions and she never hesitated in answering any of them. 
Me and my daughter are fully satisfied with the treatment we received and would recommend her to everyone else.
May the world have more doctors like you ! More success your way !
reply_text: Thank you so much for your detailed review Ms. Firdaus

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Anitha is an excellent dentist. She is very friendly, very calm and is well versed with her subject. She explained the procedure patiently and made sure we were satisfied with the treatment. The waiting time was always less than 15 minutes for me which is a major plus point. The clinic is very clean n hygienic, which is very important in covid times. I would definitely recommend her for any kind of dental treatment or procedures - braces, cosmetic procedures, aligners etc. Do not hesitate to visit her, you wont regret!
reply_text: Thank you madam for your valuable review, it is so encouraging to us and we will promise to maintain same in the       future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Anitha E. is a perfectionist who can fix otherwise unnoticed minor teeth irregularities. She is very passionate about her profession and patiently gives detailed explanations about what treatment is better suited for you and why. She is very gentle and caring with her patients and stays up to date with the latest procedures and technologies. She carefully studies each individual case and provides the treatment that is better suited for that particular individual.

10/10 Would Highly Recommend.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your very nice and explanatory feedback dear Salman. After all it's my duty to give you correct and genuine treatment when you come to me with trust. I have to appreciate for your sincere follow up of the treatment visits. It was pleasure treating you as well. Hope you are happy with the result. All the best for your bright future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We went to doctor to treat Jaw misalignment of our daughter due o absence of frontal teeth. Dr Anitha was very patient while listening to the problem. Dr.Anitha did not prescribe unnecessary x-rays since she was very careful about kids. Very friendly with kids too. She has cured a complicated lower Jaw condition of our daughter very precisely. Now we visit her for regular checkups too. Due to her experience in Dentistry, we prefer to consult her for any dental related conditions of our family, event though we have to travel from Miyapur to Banjara Hills. One thing that stands out is her patience and ability to listen to the problems. Thank you so much Dr Anitha!!
reply_text: Thank you  so much Mr. Sebastian Varghese for your detailed feedback. It was pleasure treating your kid too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am NRI, I treated abroad but I was not satisfied with abroad  treatment, one of my friend recommended me Dr. Anitha, 
I have undergone root-canal surgeries two times and fixed bridges and composite filling,from Dr. ANITHA. 4 years ago and still I have no isdues with her treated teeths. I Would highly recommend her to anybody who is in need of any dental procedures visit  her During consultation, she very patiently explained the procedures that had to be done. The only issue that really concerned me was the pain associated with these treatments, but Dr. ANITHA assured me that there would virtually be no pain at all. And contrary to popular belief, the root canal surgery  was almost painless. Her team is brilliant and they take utmost  care of you. 
I had to reschedule my appointments 3-4 times she was always at help. Definitely check her out if you are in need of any dental procedures.” I give her  Five Star5* Rated Review.  I found Dr. Anitha 's rates are very reasonable and fully satisfactory  guaranteed treatment . I introduced her with my  family, friends and in laws  they are all very happy and satisfied with her treatment and soft behaviour . I strongly recomend her, I am sure if you visit once to her clinic you will fully satisfied with her treatment and her behaviour. 
Shahnawaz Khan

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Many doctors have suggested me surgery but Dr Anita Mam treated my dental problems with braces that too only within 11 months.... I'm completely satisfied with the result...
She have even fixed my minor dental problem's
Thank you mam for understanding my problem and concerns and giving me the best treatment.
Thank you mam.
I would highly recommend you.
(dr Anita/vistadent clinic)
reply_text: Thank you Nazia

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to Dr Anitha mam for my orthodontic treatment. It was really a great experience and satisfaction. Treatment was really great and awesome.I would like to recommend everyone for the treatment here....everything was just awesome .Lots of thanks to her.
reply_text:
Thanks for your positive feedback Asif.
Extremely happy to know that you got satisfied with your treatment at Vistadent.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Anitha was great. She understood my concerns and explained the various options available to me very patiently. She was clear and upfront, letting me choose the treatment I think is best viable for me. I would definitely go back to her in the future. 

P.S. The receptionist was for some reason rude and unhelpful. If I hadn’t read good reviews about the doctor I might have cancelled my appointment altogether.
reply_text: Thank you so much pranathi for your valuable feed back and also for letting me know the issue with receptionist. Infact you helped me a lot by bringing this to my notice. Hope I can give a good service to you in case of any dental need

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been coming to this place for a long time. Dr Anitha madam is simply awesome. She is really a very helpful person and wants to get in to the root cause of the problem. I also like the fact that she has a human side to her. Which I think is missing with many in her profession. I can talk openly with her and that’s why I like her a lot.
reply_text: Thanks for your affectionate words dear Biswarup. I feel I am doing what I have to do. It was nice treating you. Take care

tags: None
review: I had a problem of tooth crowding. She took extreme care in making sure I was well informed as to what was going to happen in the long run and what the process would be. And the whole treatment went exactly as per plan and there were no complications. I would highly recommend the doctor to anyone
